name: Jet Dogfighting Game
description:
is the game laggy? please let me know in the comments as well as some specs including browser. I'll try my best to get it fixed and optimised.

Fight within an infinitely generated City and destroy your foes!

What is this?

A quick game project I developed in under a week just to test out some UI stuff and Procedural generation. This hopefully means that in the near future I might see myself making some larger procedurally generated games, Ideally survival ones.

So make sure to follow if you want to see more content like this or want some more interesting procedurally generated games in the future

Instructions are In-game.
